content: Through the first two quarters of fiscal 2022 on a constant currency basis relative to fiscal 2021, we generated total revenue of $301.5 million and non-GAAP EBITDA of $39.1 million, achieving a margin of 13.0%. Reflecting the continued strength of our business, we are reaffirming our revenue guidance and raising our EBITDA guidance for full year fiscal 2022 on a constant currency basis relative to fiscal 2021, we expect revenue in the range of $585 million to $605 million and non-GAAP EBITDA margin in the range of 11.3% to 12.0%.
